name: Sibanye Stillwater Limited
description: Sibanye Stillwater Limited is a leading international mining company with a diverse portfolio of operations focused on precious metals. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Westonaria, South Africa, the company has rapidly established itself as a significant player in the global mining industry. Sibanye Stillwater primarily engages in the extraction and processing of gold and platinum group metals (PGMs), with operations extending across South Africa and the United States. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices, ensuring that its operations contribute positively to the communities and environments in which it operates. Sibanye Stillwater's portfolio includes major assets such as the South African gold mines and the Stillwater and East Boulder mines in Montana, USA, which are among the only primary platinum group metal mines in North America. In addition to its mining activities, the company is increasingly investing in renewable energy initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint and improve energy efficiency. Sibanye Stillwater's mission is to create value for its stakeholders through a disciplined approach to capital allocation, operational excellence, and maintaining a strong balance sheet, while also contributing to the socio-economic development of the regions in which it operates.
